Features.Description: This feature tests the correct extraction of feature files

Syntax.Given: Given there are 3 feature files in the test/resources/features directory

Syntax.Then: Then they should be included in the execution

Scenarios.Scenario: Feature files are used in plugin execution

Syntax.Given: Given 3 feature files are included in the plugin execution

Syntax.Then: Then they should be converted into JSON-Format and printed into a file

Syntax.Then: Then your customers are 70% more likely to understand what your project is about
